verbose_text: The T. brucei SERCA, TBA1 (XREF_TABLE), has high affinity for calcium, is sensitive to nano-molar concentrations of thapsigargin, is expressed in intracellular microsomal fractions but not in plasma membrane fractions, and significantly increases microsomal calcium activity when over-expressed but plasma membrane Ca 2+ -ATPase activity is unchanged [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: SERCA, TBA1 ( XREF_TABLE ), has high affinity for calcium, is sensitive to nano-molar concentrations of thapsigargin, is expressed in intracellular microsomal fractions but not in plasma membrane fractions, and significantly increases microsomal calcium
